modName: Cloaks Magic - Cloak Spell FX Reduced
summary:
Makes using cloak spells less annoying!
Now you can actually see and hear when using cloak spells!
descriptionHtml:
Makes using cloak spells less annoying!

Now you can actually see and hear when using cloak spells!

Changes Fire, Frost, and Lightning Cloaks:
*removes 1st person particle effects
*removes active cloak sound effects

The screenshots do a poor job of demonstrating the changes.

Try my other mod!
Cloak spells last 3min: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48892/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48892/[/url]


This mod is allso available on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=204600647
